creator: tlownie@yahoo.com
text:
The following SVG document (10k) loads and builds
but generates an 'Array Out of Bounds' Exception
when Batik tries to render it.

(1) The file was exported with the SVG option of
Adobe Illustrator 9.0 and renders properly with
the Adobe SVG View 2.0 plug-in

(2) The exception was traced to the LinearGradientPaintContext.java
procedure generated when rendering the SVG to an JSVGCanvas.

-----Cut Here-----

Stylable//EN"   "http://www.w3.org/TR/2000/03/WD-SVG-20000303/DTD/svg-20000303-
stylable.dtd">
